channel.title: Announcing Two New Carloop Accessories
channel.description: We are very excited to announce our latest addition to the Carloop Store! Please give your warmest welcome to: * Female OBD-II Port: https://store.carloop.io/products/female-obd-ii-port * OBD-I Splitter Y-Cable: https://store.carloop.io/products/obd-ii-splitter-y-cable We've searched high and low for a quality supplier of these two items and we've found one that meets our standards. I've already used the Y-Cable to quickly figure out how to send the right CAN Messages to select specific OBD-II modes or reverse engineer proprietary scan tools. And of course, the Female OBD-II Port was thoroughly tested on our Carloop Dashboard. (See pic below) Here's a close-up:

item.title: Announcing Two New Carloop Accessories
item.dc:creator: alanm
item.description:
We are very excited to announce our latest addition to the Carloop Store! Please give your warmest welcome to:

  • Female OBD-II Port: https://store.carloop.io/products/female-obd-ii-port
  • OBD-I Splitter Y-Cable: https://store.carloop.io/products/obd-ii-splitter-y-cable

We’ve searched high and low for a quality supplier of these two items and we’ve found one that meets our standards. I’ve already used the Y-Cable to quickly figure out how to send the right CAN Messages to select specific OBD-II modes or reverse engineer proprietary scan tools.

And of course, the Female OBD-II Port was thoroughly tested on our Carloop Dashboard. (See pic below)

Here’s a close-up:

Read full topic
